name: Bingo World Wide
description: Bingo Card is an electronic game board for the game of Bingo.  Bingo Card generates an unlimited amount of cards, tap on the numbers as they are called to mark them.  If you accidentally mark a number simply tap it again to remove the marker.  Bingo Card is meant to be used along side 'Bingo Caller.'  'Bingo Caller' is an application from 1026 Development used to generate and track numbers called in a game of Bingo.
